snippet: The European Parliament weighs how to regulate electronic cigarettes, while JPMorgan Chase and Wells Fargo kick off Wall Street’s third-quarter earnings season on Friday.
lead_paragraph: The European Parliament weighs how to regulate electronic cigarettes, while JPMorgan Chase and Wells Fargo kick off Wall Street’s third-quarter earnings season on Friday.

headline.main: Economic Reports for the Week Ahead
